website_summaries.verdict: A practical and attractive design with a streamlined, modern look. Fits a variety of GMC and Chevrolet models.
pros: Sports a patented iBoard design with wide step space
Rugged aluminum construction is covered with a rust-proof black matte coating
cons: They are a bit challenging to install, and some customers find the instructions confusing

customer_reviews.title: Stylish on the 2019 GMC Sierra 2500HD SLT
customer_reviews.text: 2019 GMC Sierra 2500HD SLT The driver side installed in minutes. So easy. The passenger side was a little more difficult because of my DEF tank. That front special bracket was a chore to get in place and yes, you will have to trim the DEF tank cover just a little. I think I trimmed less than 1” depth.
customer_reviews.author: K2 Pro

customer_reviews.title: Stealthy look
customer_reviews.text: I've owned my truck over 9 years and love the way it looked. I never liked running boards on a two wheel drive. I can get in just fine. My wife on the other hand... not so much. i bought these because they don't stand out. After I installed the driver side, my son was walking up. I asked him what he thought about them. He said he didn't even notice them. NICE! They look good and now my wife can get in. Also makes it easier for me to dry the top after I wash it. Still kinda meh about having running boards on a 2 wheel drive though.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy install if you WATCH VIDEOS
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these boards today. Took about an hour and 15 minutes. Seem very sturdy. Looks good on my 2017 Chevy Silverado crew cab. The only complaint I have is the same as most. The front passenger mounting bracket needs assembly, which was a little tricky. However, I took my time and that particular bracket was as sturdy as the rest. All the hardware needed was included. The product was packaged well. Would recommend this as an alternative to any $300 to $500 nerf bars or running boards. The installation was fairly easy and saved a couple hundred bucks on install charges as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Look good but install could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Look good and appear to be solid. Not sure why APS can’t start just adding 6 normal brackets instead of the funky bracket for the passenger front. I literally spent 1 hour to get that one bracket installed and the other five took maybe 30 mins. No reason to have this bracket other than saving money and lazy to change it to 6x normal brackets. Big PIA To install the passenger front even after watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: CigarDaze

customer_reviews.title: The installation was also not too bad, although the directions could be organized a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and well-packed. The installation was also not too bad, although the directions could be organized a lot better. My biggest issue (and why I am not giving 5 stars) has to do with the number of brackets included. The unit comes with three mounting brackets for each side. That leaves a significant gap behind the last bracket and the back end of the running board. While the selling distributor stated that the boards are tested at 300 lbs and a fourth bracket is not needed, the appearance of the spacing leaves much to be desired. The selling distributor said they are not in position to send additional brackets, hence the review...
customer_reviews.author: BSA

customer_reviews.title: Junk in disguise
customer_reviews.text: These looked great for about a year. Then the paint started coming off around the edges and look awful. It is so bad, I searched thru purchases from 2017 just to leave a review to warn people not to buy these running boards. They are sturdy and look great when you first install them, but have no life in them. A running board should at least last for 5 years before looking this bad.
customer_reviews.author: KFoot

customer_reviews.title: I (like others) recommend getting help
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not the most heavy duty but I searched for low profile and these fit the bill. I (like others) recommend getting help. The biggest problem I had was finding the factory holes in the frame. After that it was it was pretty much -follow instruction.
customer_reviews.author: CSI PI

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 of the bolts and nuts are missing. Make ...
customer_reviews.text: 1/3 of the bolts and nuts are missing. Make sure you check the hardware package before you start installing the Running Boards. Found the bolts and nuts at a local specialty bolt and screw shop here in San Antonio Texas.
customer_reviews.author: A. E.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 2017 Silverado 1500 Delivered on time, installed easily. The coating pealed off in less than two years.
customer_reviews.author: ray cancino

customer_reviews.title: ... years ago for my husbands truck and they are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a couple years ago for my husbands truck and they are awesome!!! We were able to install them ourselves relatively quickly. They have not given us any problems and are such a nice addition to the truck, especially for our kids.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I own a 2016 Silverado but they didn't come with running boards. These were easy to put on and no extra holes had to be made. They are very sturdy and look great on my truck!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, great fit and everyone gets in super eady now
customer_reviews.author: jason thornton

customer_reviews.title: Easy and look great
customer_reviews.text: They were very easy to install. Instructions were pretty straight forward. Took about 2 hours by myself. Seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very sturdy. Came in on time. I've had them for 1 1/2 years and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Baba1212

customer_reviews.title: I don't like being able to see the hardware but so far ...
customer_reviews.text: They're "ok" I mean the price can't be beat. I don't like being able to see the hardware but so far they're solid
customer_reviews.author: c0rey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look good and easy to install! Very sturdy! 2018 Silverado crew cab.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly! You would never know they were not factory installed. Very clean lines. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, work great
customer_reviews.text: had them professionally installed, perfect fit, work great, feel sturdy when stepped on and look great!
customer_reviews.author: glynn mejia

customer_reviews.title: A step up
customer_reviews.text: Easy install I installed these in about 2 hours alone and they look and work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and took less than an hour to install.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my 2010 1500. Made it so much easier for my mother to get in and out of the truck
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice step rails at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install instructions were simple to understand. Very sturdy mounts and looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Allison

customer_reviews.title: Look Great on my Silverado
customer_reviews.text: Running Boards look great. The passenger side was a little tricky to install. Very durable and a great fit for my Silverado.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice running boards. Looks good with our truck. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B

customer_reviews.title: They look great on my 2017 Silverado 2500HD crew cab
customer_reviews.text: They look great on my 2017 Silverado 2500HD crew cab.Instructions were a little difficult to comprehend at first but once I was under the truck, it was easy to identify the mounting points and figure out the installation process.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: They look great on my 2017 Silverado Crew Cab
customer_reviews.text: They look great on my 2017 Silverado Crew Cab! Got the 5" and glad I did. Easy to install as everyone says.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: 2014 silverado crew cab
customer_reviews.text: Love these on my 2014 silverado 1500 crew cab, great buy at this price. Def. have to go with the 5 inch. And only took about 45min to install
customer_reviews.author: Curtis L. Fudge jr.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just a bad batch of paint
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black 5 inch boards last August, so that makes them 8-9 months old and the paint is already flaking off. I wash my rig at least 2 times a week, so i know the issue is not due to lack of maintenance. Maybe just a bad batch of paint?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice running board bu It seems to need a extra ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice running board bu It seems to need a extra brace on each side, also the bolts to mount the board to the braces are very weak without much force I broke two of them on each side.
customer_reviews.author: David Roed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, feels sturdy. Pretty easy to install only headache was the passenger front bracket. But it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Felix

customer_reviews.title: Basic, functional, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These running boards are basic, yet functional. They look great on my 2015 Silverado, and took about two hours for me to install by myself. I like the fact that there is no chrome to oxidize or get beat up by sand and gravel thrown by the tires. The instructions were quite good too. Sorry, the photo is not the best, but given how bright the sun was that day, I took the picture in my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Good not great, still worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install. Did it in less than an hour. They look nice not fantastic but then again just a portion of the price of name brand ones. If these don't last I will still buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and reasonably easy to install. Did not require any special tools.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne F Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great but the front passenger bracket has way to much give because is a 2 piece bracket i guess they make it for older models but on my 2016 silverado a regular passenger side bracket would work much better, which i can get it exchanged for a regular bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Nice runing boards.  So far they seem well built.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. easy to install with moderate mechanical skills. Attachment hardware is chrome colored and stands out as pointed out in other reviews. Fixed that with black aerosol spray liner from Rustoleum,
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't even have a year with it n it and the paint started coming off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the end result, but I would have added a fourth support on each side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chevrolet Silverado 2016, Crew Cab.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, no drilling needed, only tool needed 13mm socket.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to follow instructions , use existing holes and nut inserts in rocker panel .Use socket set for simple bolt on product. Some Mechanical ability needed . Nice fit and finish .
customer_reviews.author: Steamfitter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought the construction of the top rail cover was not long time durable
customer_reviews.author: robert wiggins

customer_reviews.title: All Around Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome running boards! Really dressed up my 2016 Silverado Crew Cab. Very sturdy. I'm about 290 lbs and they don't flex a bit. Very impressed with them. I went with the matte black because my truck is white. Looks sharp! Installed myself in about 1.5 hours. To do again, about half that time.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman 55

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a fraction of the cost of most running boards. Very durable and gives my truck the look I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: A.m

customer_reviews.title: The product is great, works awesome
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, works awesome. Only issue I had was with packaging of the hardware. Bag was ripped and hardware was everywhere. Had to get some of my own nuts and bolts to finish.
customer_reviews.author: john esposito

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy if you're considering them.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described and fits perfectly. Really easy to install, I just watched a YouTube video and then skimmed the directions. I installed them yesterday in light rain without a problem. I got the 5" and am happy that I chose that size b/c they look great on my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Girl

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. 5" gives a comfortably wide step with a good grip. seem to be very sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Prompt service, easy to install and very nice quality. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: KPM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boards are great look really good and are sturdy and have traction even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking running boards. Easy to install and shipped in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: K.G

customer_reviews.title: Great look on my 2014 Chevy Silverado 1500 WT
customer_reviews.text: Great look on my 2014 Chevy Silverado 1500 WT. Only confusing part was the one universal piece that had to be done differently than every other mount. Also the back tabs were bent by machine on my frame so had to straighten them in order to put the tabs in to bolt to the frame. Other than that once I look at it now it was pretty easy to install. Would recommend to anyone that is looking for good quality running boards at a fraction of the cost of dealer installed boards and for those who do not like the pipe design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped immediately and arrived on the scheduled delivery date. Installing this item was fairly simple as long as you follow the directions. The boards look great, however, the brackets and hardware are not so attractive. The nuts and bolts are chrome, and highly visible on a blacked out product. I ended up spray painting them black for a quick fix. The brackets look, for lack of a better word, cheap. Just a flat piece of metal (thankfully those are black), that hang down approximately 3 inches below the boards. Fix the brackets and hardware... I would buy this product again. As is, I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are ok, but just was not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: jay.r. bennett

customer_reviews.title: look good on our truck
customer_reviews.text: good priced, little timely to install, took my husband about 1 1/2 hours and hes a mechanic, the instructions are a little ruff to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Newby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! And very strong. I have had several comments on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: dkoehlers

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not mechanically inclined yet this was a very easy install. A few words of advice: 1) lay out and organize all of the parts, 2) read and understand ALL the instructions before you start. The boards seem sturdy and look great on the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my hubby and he loved them. Good quality and easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Orlando

customer_reviews.title: iBoard running boards Chevy Silverado LT 2016 4 Door Crew Cab
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and worth the price compared to others out there. Product shipped quickly and was in good packing when arrived. My only concern is the 4 bolts used to mount board be sure not to overtighten they will snap off. I had this happen on me to one screw so be carefull with that otherwise good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i was really satisfied with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: omar vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Must get these running boards
customer_reviews.text: Great running boards for the price. They make my truck look really nice. Really easy to install did it by myself, the instructions could be a little more clear but overall an easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

product_meta.title: APS iBoard Running Boards 5" Black Custom Fit 2007-2018 Chevy Silverado/GMC Sierra Crew Cab (Nerf Bars | Side Steps | Side Bars)
feature_bullets: Package includes: (2) iBoard running boards, mounting brackets and hardware kit for an easy DIY install
AIRCRAFT GRADE 6061-T6 ALUMINUM BUILD - Solid aluminum running boards, iBoard side steps offer the best in corrosion protection, durability, and strength (300 LBS load capacity)
FULL COVERAGE STEP PAD - 5" wide corrugated rubber step pad covers the entire running board, providing a secure, slip-proof, comfortable step for the whole family
UNIQUE LOW PROFILE DESIGN- Upgrade your truck's style with iBoard's patented low profile design. Look different with iBoard running boards!

Easy to install Rocker Panel Mount and custom fit for your: 2007-2018 Chevy Silverado/GMC Sierra Crew Cab & 2019 2500 HD/3500 HD Crew Cab (Excl. 07 Classic)(Incl. 2019 Silverado 1500 LD & 2019 Sierra 1500 Limited)(Incl. Diesel Models With DEF Tanks)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
